info.name: Habitica: Boss Button
info.description: Hides all the gamified Habitica images to leave a professional impression. With Stylish this can be turned on and off in just two clicks!
info.additionalInfo:
Can be combined with:
Habitica Ultra-Compact (https://userstyles.org/styles/123383/habitica-ultra-compact-animated-w-backgrounds) 
Habitica: Hide Tags (https://userstyles.org/styles/129853/habitica-hide-tags)
Habitica: Hide New Task Field (https://userstyles.org/styles/130149/habitica-hide-new-task-field)
Habitica: Hide Guilds List (https://userstyles.org/styles/129852/habitica-hide-guilds-list)
